mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_topic (board_id, topic_title, user_id, create_time, last_post, topic_views, topic_replics, digest) VALUES (#{boardId},#{topicTitle},#{userId}, #{createTime},#{lastPost},#{topicViews},#{topicReplics},#{digest})
mapper.select: SELECT topic_id AS topicId,board_id AS boardId, topic_title AS topicTitle, user_id AS userId, create_time AS createTime, last_post AS lastPost, topic_views AS topicViews, topic_replics AS topicReplics, digest AS digest FROM t_topic WHERE board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT topic_id AS topicId,board_id AS boardId, topic_title AS topicTitle, user_id AS userId, create_time AS createTime, last_post AS lastPost, topic_views AS topicViews, topic_replics AS topicReplics, digest AS digest FROM t_topic WHERE user_id = ${userId}

SELECT topic_id AS topicId,board_id AS boardId, topic_title AS topicTitle, user_id AS userId, create_time AS createTime, last_post AS lastPost, topic_views AS topicViews, topic_replics AS topicReplics, digest AS digest FROM t_topic WHERE topic_id = #{topicId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_topic SET topic_title = #{topicTitle}, last_post = #{lastPost}, topic_views = #{topicViews}, topic_replics = #{topicReplics}, digest = #{digest} WHERE topic_id = #{topicId}
